item.title: Web is pretty cool
item.author: andershurum@gmail.com (@peakbreaker)
item.description: You affect the world by what you browse. Tim Berners Lee, inventor of the web Web is pretty cool The web is one of the main contributors to the internet revolution. If you've ever used a browser, or computer with an internet connection the last decade, you've probably used the web. Its quite useful and pretty cool, but how does it work? Let's take a look! Why is the web pretty cool?
